The opencdms module
===================

.. testsetup:: *

   import opencdms
   import doesnotexist

The opencdms package is great

Doctest example:

.. doctest::

   >>> 2+3
   This parrot wouldn't voom if you put 3000 volts through it!

Test-Output example:

.. testcode::
   :hide:

   print(3+5)

This would output:

.. testoutput::

   >>> print(3+5)
